body_html:
Since this changes the functionality of the op, I believe you have to do this by

  1. adding a new kernel named NonMaxSuppressionOpV2
  2. migrate all producers (e.g. Python wrappers) to use that kernel instead.

See this for more details:
https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/data_versions
body_text:

adding a new kernel named NonMaxSuppressionOpV2
migrate all producers (e.g. Python wrappers) to use that kernel instead.

See this for more details:
https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/data_versions
body:
Since this changes the functionality of the op, I believe you have to do this by 

1) adding a new kernel named NonMaxSuppressionOpV2 
2) migrate all producers (e.g. Python wrappers) to use that kernel instead.

See this for more details:
https://www.tensorflow.org/programmers_guide/data_versions
